**課程簡介**

本課程為接續德語（三）的課程。這學期的會話主題包括旅行、到別的城市拜訪朋友、身體的部位、描述一般疾病的用語、就醫時的一般會話、在旅館中如何詢問一些資訊、旅館工作人員需要服務的事項和具備的能力以及說明自己擅長學習什麼和想學習什麼。在文法的部分，學生將複習德語的介系詞和動詞如何共同影響名詞的格位變化、情態動詞、更多疑問句的形式，並且練習用各種連接詞造句。課程參與者需要密集的學習。

**英文簡介**

This course is the continuation of the course - German III. In this semester, the conversation topics will focus on traveling, visiting your friends in another city, talking about body parts, describing diseases, talking to a doctor, how to ask for some information in a hotel, what hotel staff need to serve and what they can do, and describing what you are good at learning and what you want to learn. In terms of grammar, students will review and practice modal verbs, how prepositions and verbs together contribute to the declension, using more forms of interrogative sentences, and building sentences with different conjunctions. Intensive learning is strongly recommended.
